review: Can't beat the Fire TV Stick for this price point. Interface is great but obviously prefers Amazon content.The only real issue I've had is that it stutters from time to time. For the most part, it works great but occasionally it stutters to the point that it's very distracting. Usually, after pausing and playing again it will stop but sometimes it doesn't right away.
